descriptions.description: More core developers increase mentorship, accelerating the promotion of new core developers. This reinforcing loop creates exponential growth in the core team's capacity.
Core developers mentor contributors, increasing their skills and promotion rate, which further expands the core team. This amplifies the project's development capability over time.
Promoting experienced contributors to core roles reduces their number, creating a balancing effect that regulates the pool of senior members available for promotion.
As new contributors skill up, they graduate from the new contributor pool, creating a balancing loop that naturally limits the growth of inexperienced members.
